content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- edited with XMLSpy v2014 sp1 (x64) (http://www.altova.com) by XMLSpy 2013 Professional Ed. Release 2, Installed for 6 users (with SMP from 2013-10-18 to 2014-10-19) (NOAA) --> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified">  <xs:include schemaLocation="gml-ish.xsd"/>  <xs:include schemaLocation="BasicTypes.xsd"/>  <xs:complexType name="BenchmarksType">   <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/>    <xs:element name="position" type="LatLonType"/>    <xs:element name="ellipsoidHeight">     <xs:complexType>      <xs:simpleContent>       <xs:extension base="xs:string">        <xs:attribute name="units" type="LinearUnitsType" default="meters"/>       </xs:extension>      </xs:simpleContent>     </xs:complexType>    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="ownerAgency" type="xs:string"/>    <xs:element name="images" type="ImageType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">     <xs:annotation>      <xs:documentation>Photos or rubbings of the benchmark</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="reports">     <xs:annotation>      <xs:documentation>Reports will be attached via a browse-to button</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>     <xs:complexType>      <xs:sequence>       <xs:element name="opusReport" type="AttachedFileType" nillable="true" maxOccurs="unbounded">        <xs:annotation>         <xs:documentation>PDF file should be named according to Station ID Julian Day and Session ex. NOAA1441_opus.PDF</xs:documentation>        </xs:annotation>       </xs:element>       <xs:element name="qualityControlReport" type="AttachedFileType" nillable="true" maxOccurs="unbounded">        <xs:annotation>         <xs:documentation>PDF file should be named according to Station ID and GPS week ex. NOAA1615_qc.PDF</xs:documentation>        </xs:annotation>       </xs:element>       <xs:element name="fieldObservationLogs" type="AttachedFileType" nillable="true" maxOccurs="unbounded">        <xs:annotation>         <xs:documentation>PDF file should be named according to Station ID and Julian Day ex. NOAA144_fol.PDF</xs:documentation>        </xs:annotation>       </xs:element>      </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>    </xs:element>   </xs:sequence>  </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
